title: Science of Happiness: Scheduling Time to Feel Awe
description: Feeling awe can boost your mood and make you feel more connected with others. Comedian Chris Duffy learns how to tap into it. This is an episode of The Science of Happiness podcast. For more, find the podcast wherever you're listening to this.
itunes:title: Science of Happiness: Scheduling Time to Feel Awe
itunes:subtitle: How to Be a Better Human host Chris Duffy taps into awe
author: contact@ted.com (TED and PRX)
